name: Mandelbrotviewerqt
body:
#MandelbrotViewerQt   
   
##Mandelbrot viewer with a minimalist UI and controls.  
###Implemented as a Qt QWidget so you can include it in your own projects.   
 - Left click = zoom in   
 - Right click = zoom out   
 - Left/Right arrows = change colors   
        
   
   
![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ptjohns2/MandelbrotViewerQt/master/demos/GUI_mandel.png?raw=true)
   
![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ptjohns2/MandelbrotViewerQt/master/demos/mini_mandel1.png?raw=true)
   
![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ptjohns2/MandelbrotViewerQt/master/demos/spiral1.png?raw=true)
   
![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ptjohns2/MandelbrotViewerQt/master/demos/mini_mandel2.png?raw=true)
